title: Doubutsu Mura no World Cup: Yoiko no Koutsuu Anzen
original_name: どうぶつ村のワールドカップ〜よい子のこうつうあんぜん〜
sinopse: A children's traffic safety anime with a soccer theme in honor of the 2002 World Cup which was hosted in Japan and South Korea. Many children want to play the sport but it's easy for them to get into accidents chasing after balls in the street.
